comments:
I've been trying to install just the JBoss IDE plugin in the 3.1RC3 release. I'm
running eclipse in the 1.5 JDK. Eclipse starts downloading the components of the
JBoss plugin, then gets "stuck" in the middle of downloading a file, then times
out, then presents a dialog that asks to try again, then if respond "Yes" will
pause for a short while, then responsd with an "internal error" dialog that has
a description that simply says 

"Already connected"

I've had this problem on both OS X and Windows XP.

Looking in the error log, there are 3 errors, in this order:

java.io.IOException: InputStream ended after 159744 bytes (expected 1232431 )
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.core.UpdateManagerUtils.copy(UpdateManagerUtils.java:897)
at
org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureContentProvider.asLocalReference(FeatureContentProvider.java:278)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.getPluginEntryArchiveReferences(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:165)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.operations.UpdateUtils.downloadFeatureContent(UpdateUtils.java:627)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.download(InstallWizard2.java:405)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.access$3(InstallWizard2.java:394)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2$4.run(InstallWizard2.java:350)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)


java.lang.IllegalStateException: Already connected
at java.net.URLConnection.setRequestProperty(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.setRequestProperty(Unknown Source)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.core.HttpResponse.getInputStream(HttpResponse.java:46)
at
org.eclipse.update.core.ContentReference.getPartialInputStream(ContentReference.java:166)
at
org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureContentProvider.asLocalReference(FeatureContentProvider.java:225)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.getPluginEntryArchiveReferences(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:165)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.operations.UpdateUtils.downloadFeatureContent(UpdateUtils.java:627)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.download(InstallWizard2.java:405)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.access$3(InstallWizard2.java:394)
at
org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2$4.run(InstallWizard2.java:350)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)


(the previous error is repeated once more)

Created an attachment (id=23739)
My Eclipse configuration
I should mention that this issue does not occur in 3.1 RC2 and earlier 3.1 releases.

Fix available since last nightly build.  If possible, please download and 
verify.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 100704 ***

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 100704 ***

The IOException is legitimate and inicates a broken connection to the server 
due to network congestions and such.
The IllegalStateException: Already connected was a bug and it got addressed, 
so when retrying, downloading can resume.  It may still require user 
intervention (click retry or go throught the wizard again), but won't 
necessiate restarting the workbench.
The latest nightly build did fix the issue, thank you.
